goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there is a black object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: you should never pick and place a box
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.4: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted, but only soft objects are permitted
